Vocabulary Learning Tips

Use Flashcards

Create physical or digital flashcards to review new words regularly.

Read Daily

Reading exposes you to vocabulary in context, which helps with retention.

Write Sentences

Practice using new words in your own sentences to reinforce learning.

Speak with Others

Use new vocabulary in conversation to improve recall and fluency.
